CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 9, 1955, pg. 1 reads: "Sentenced For Life - Nathaniel Williams or Kid Rickey, as he was known during his prize-fighting days, is escorted by two deputy sheriffs to Criminal Court where he was sentenced to life imprisonment for the Oct. 22 murder in Braddock of a woman he lived with. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Nathaniel "Kid Rickey" Williams, being escorted by two deputy sheriffs to Criminal Court in Allegheny County Courthouse
